title: Radiant Watchface Fully Loaded
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Step into the future with this futuristic watch face. Radiant watch face is a beautifully designed watchface for your smartwatch. It’s a blend of rich technology and a futuristic appearance loaded with a variety of options to ease you.You can get all the important notification right on your wrist. Watch battery, phone battery, current temperature, wind speed, humidity, weather and barometer all packed in one design. Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-•	Watch battery.•	Phone battery.•	Current temperature.•	Wind speed and humidity.•	Weather and barometer.•	Faster recognition with percentages and icons.•	Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG Watch Urbane and LG Watch R. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Step into the future with this futuristic watch face. Radiant watch face is a beautifully designed watchface for your smartwatch. It’s a blend of rich technology and a futuristic appearance loaded with a variety of options to ease you.
You can get all the important notification right on your wrist. Watch battery, phone battery, current temperature, wind speed, humidity, weather and barometer all packed in one design.

Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-

• Watch battery.
• Phone battery.
• Current temperature.
• Wind speed and humidity.
• Weather and barometer.
• Faster recognition with percentages and icons.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG Watch Urbane and LG Watch R. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Broken Will not send changes to settings to target device, and always says "check your internet connection"
